Text: Out of Office AutoReply SEC Letterpst Michael Levy will be out of the office on business until on or about January He will have some limited access to emails and will respond as quickly as he can In addition please feel free to contact his secretary Megan Morgan at if you need to reach him immediately You may also leave him a voicemail at and he will get back to you as soon as he can Thanks

RE Out of Office AutoReply SEC Letter Cc Vince I too enjoyed meeting you and I wish you all the best in the SEC testimony and otherwise Should you at any time conclude that counsel would be helpful even if only marginally or if you simply want to confer in connection with the SEC or any other governmental investigation please feel free to give me a call Id be happy to help Sincerely Michael Levy Original Message From To WIDLAWcom Cc Sent PM Subject RE Out of Office AutoReply SEC Letter Michael To follow up on my first message I want to inform you that I decided to appear before the SEC investigators without a legal counsel I simply feel that your highly competent help is not required in my case I want to thank you for the time you spent with me on Wednesday My only regret is that I shall have no opportunity to spend more time with you and learn from your experience Vince Original Message From Levy Michael WIDLAWcomENRON Sent Friday January PM To Kaminski Vince J Subject Out of Office AutoReply SEC Letter Michael Levy will be out of the office on business until on or about January He will have some limited access to emails and will respond as quickly as he can In addition please feel free to contact his secretary Megan Morgan at if you need to reach him immediately You may also leave him a voicemail at and he will get back to you as soon as he can Thanks This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL Memorandum Concerning Congressional Investigations Relating to Enron Cc Attached is a privileged and confidential memorandum concerning the various congressional investigations relating to Enron In anticipation of our preparation for and your participation in staff interviews with the House Energy and Commerce Committee next week I thought you might like to review this background material in advance Well have more detailed intelligence from the Hill to share with you orally when we meet next week In order to preserve the attorneyclient privilege and because of the politically sensitive nature of some of this material please do not share it with anyone Ill be back in Houston Sunday night and can be reached first thing Monday morning at In the meantime please feel free to call me in DC with any questions Otherwise Ill see you next week Thanks Michael Michael N Levy Swidler Berlin Shereff Friedman LLP The preceding Email message contains information that is confidential may be protected by the attorneyclient or other applicable privileges and may constitute nonpublic information It is intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipients If you are not an intended recipient of this message please notify the sender at Unauthorized use dissemination distribution or reproduction of this message is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful Original Message From DeLorenzo James Sent Friday January PM To Levy Michael Subject vDOC
